lead_paragraph: The former Olympic sprint champion Marion Jones will run her first race in almost a year Saturday, when she competes against the former world champion Torri Edwards over 100 meters in Veracruz, Mexico. Jones, 30, has not competed since finishing fourth in a 100-meter race in Monterrey, Mexico, last June 11.
